text.data: Chapter 14 When the Bird-Dragon Awakens...[end]
Melodia: Yippee!! It's Godland! I'm back home![end]
Come on everybody, let's take a break![end]
Lukia: Hey, Melodia. Why did you leave Godland?[end]
Melodia: I wanted to ride the dragons. And there were Mini-Devils too![end]
[character][0x1]: Wait, Melodia![end]

Matelite: I don't get it... Why don't Campbell and Godland fight back?
Isn't it horrible being ruled by the Empire?[end]
Lukia: Everybody's different, Matelite. Didn't Mahal fight? Donfan... Jeanne...[end]
Matelite: Enough of your incessant ranting![end]
Sendak: Huh? Oh, I did not realize that I was rambling...[end]
[character][0x0]! I leave it all in your hands![end]
You got a Brunhag.[end]

Sendak: Donfan... Did he disembark? I would rather he not start a ruckus...
As I am the captain, it infuriates me whenever rules or orders are disobeyed...[end]
Sendak: Well then, it is the same as always...[end]
Sendak: Shall we go?[end]
Taicho: If we leave it up to [character][0x0], we will have no worries![end]
Lukia: Always working hard, eh, [character][0x0]. Keep up the good work![end]

Um... [character][0x0]. I think I just saw a Mini-Devil.
It looked like it was a little different than the ones on [character][0x9]...[end]
[character][0x1]: Apparently this is Melodia's house. Listening to the sounds inside makes me feel happy.[end]
You got 6 Sweet Honeys.[end][end]
[character][0x1]: It sounds like she's remembering something from her childhood...[end]

[character][0x1]: There is a Holy Dragon in Godland too, but...
Are we being led by it...?[end]
Matelite: You worried about Mist? Don't worry, she'll regain her senses while fighting.[end]
Mist: I'm fine. Take me with you. I'll try not to get in your way.[end]

Donfan: When a girl tells me to come with her, it is my destiny to go where ever she goes... Oh, but there are certainly other girls waiting for me...
Oh, what to do...[end]
Melodia: Let's hurry and get on the dragons![end]
Grandfather: This is what people long ago said.[end]
1 Mini-Devil means a break-up, 2 Mini-Devils mean happiness, 3 Mini-Devils mean something new...[end]
Not ready Let's go!![end1][end]
Okay, Melodia. Now you try saying the rest.[end]
Melodia: Let's see... 4 Mini-Devils mean meeting somebody new![end]
Grandfather: Indeed. Well done.[end]

Melodia: Thanks!
The Holy Dragons'll definitely be our friends! No matter how mad they get we'll be okay![end]
Taicho: Once preparations have been made we will leave![end]
Matelite: Okay, it's time to fight! Next up is either some monsters or the Empire! [character][0x0]! Make sure we're all prepared![end]
Grandfather: My adages have been of use to you, have they not?[end]
Ho ho... Melodia has returned. How nice it is to see her again.[end]

The Magic City of Godland... It's a story from times long ago...
All of the wizards and priests died during the war with the Empire.
After that, Godland ended its fighting.[end]

Oh! Captain of the Dragon Squad? Is that so?
Then, is that dragon I smell? It's quite pungent![end]

I was surprised when you came.
They say that it was unbearable when Godland was enveloped in the fighting. Good thing we won...[end]
[character][0x0] of the Dragon Squad? Hmm... you seem like a pretty nice guy. You smell a little bit, though.[end]
Huh? You're new here, aren't you? Welcome to Godland![end]
When I grow up I'm gonna join the Resistance too! They're so cool![end]
You got a Dark Grass.[end]
Donfan: Why, hello, my lovely angel![end]
My name is Donfan.[end]
Donfan: And standing next to you is the studly [character][0x0]![end]
The warrior of love... and captain of Kahna's Dragon Squad, [character][0x0]![end]
Captain of Kahna's Dragon Squad?![end]
Donfan: ...Wait a minute. You know [character][0x0]?[end]
Will you two come with me?[end]
Dragons are scary...[end]
Dragons are smelly...[end][end]
